marketing.title: Find Hot Leads Instantly with
marketing.sub_title: An easy-to-use and enterprise-grade Lead asesment tool. Your complete All-in-One solution for getting confirmed Leads.
marketing.sub_features: Find and verify emails, discover leads, and track your usage with a secure, modern web app.
marketing.devops_features: Easy deployment and integration with Google/Firebase.
marketing.price_features: Transparent pricing, pay only for what you use.

right_side.deploy_on_vercel_desc: Get started in seconds, see results instantly.
right_side.ship_on_cloudflare_desc: Use our bulk finder to process hundreds of emails in minutes.
right_side.showcase_desc: See what people are building and chat with them. Show off your results to the world.

features_grid.email_finder_desc: Find professional emails for any name and domain, with LinkedIn enrichment.
features_grid.single_verify_desc: Instantly check if an email address is valid using SMTP and MX checks.
features_grid.bulk_verify_desc: Upload a CSV or Excel file to verify hundreds of emails at once, with downloadable results.
features_grid.bulk_finder_desc: Upload a list of names and domains to find and verify emails in bulk.
features_grid.dashboard_desc: Track your usage, manage your account, and download your results.
